This website supports the OxSalt care bundle, which is an intervention package developed to empower people with chronic kidney disease to lower their salt intake. If you want to reduce your own salt intake, click on Start from the menu or click here.

The OxSalt care bundle was shown to work in a randomized clinical trial whch has been published in Kidney360, a peer-reviewed journal of the American Society of Nephrology.

The OxSalt clinical trial

Evaluation of a Simple Low-cost Intervention to Empower People with CKD to Reduce Their Dietary Salt Intake: OxCKD1, a Multicenter Randomized Controlled Trial.
O'Callaghan CA, Camidge C, Thomas R, Reschen ME, Maycock AJ, Lasserson DS, Fox RA, Thomas NPB, Shine B, James T.
Kidney360 2023 4 (7) 890-898 PMID:37254243 Pubmed link

You can read this publication on the Kidney360 journal website or on PubMedCentral.

You can view and download details of the intervention by clicking on the Files tab above or on the image below.

The OxSalt care bundle was developed for people with chronic kidney disease, but should also be helpful for people without chronic kidney disease who want to reduce their salt intake.
